info.title: open-data
info.description: The Open Data API specifications allow API providers (e.g. banks, building societies and ATM providers) to develop API endpoints which can then be accessed by API users (e.g. third party developers) to build mobile and web applications for banking customers.

/public/banks.summary: Get a list of all banks
/public/banks.description:
Returns a list of banks supported:

* ID used as parameter in URLs
* Short and full name of bank
* Logo URL
* Website

get.summary: Returns a list of banks supported

/public/banks/{bank_id}.summary: Path used to manage a single banks.
/public/banks/{bank_id}.description:
Returns information about a single bank specified by BANK_ID including:

* Short and full name of bank
* Logo URL
* Website

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `banks`.

/public/banks/{bank_id}/atms.summary: Returns information about ATMs for a single bank specified by BANK_ID
/public/banks/{bank_id}/atms.description:
Returns information about ATMs for a single bank specified by BANK_ID including:
* Address
* Geo Location
* License the data under this endpoint is released under

Pagination:
* By default, 100 records are returned.

You can use the url query parameters limit and offset for pagination

value.name: Atm by the Lake
value.more_info: short walk to the lake from here

get.summary: Returns information about ATMs for a single bank
get.description: Returns information about ATMs for a single bank specified by BANK_ID

/public/banks/{bank_id}/atms/{atm_id}.summary: Returns information about ATM for a single bank
/public/banks/{bank_id}/atms/{atm_id}.description:
Returns information about ATM for a single bank specified by BANK_ID and ATM_ID including:
* Address
* Geo Location
* License the data under this endpoint is released under

value.name: Atm by the Lake
value.more_info: short walk to the lake from here

get.summary: Returns information about ATM for a single bank
get.description: Returns information about ATM for a single bank specified by BANK_ID and ATM_ID

/public/banks/{bank_id}/products.summary: Returns information about the financial products offered by a bank
/public/banks/{bank_id}/products.description:
Returns information about the financial products offered by a bank specified by BANK_ID including:
* Name
* Code
* Parent Product Code
* Category
* Family
* Super Family
* More info URL
* Description
* Terms and Conditions
* License the data under this endpoint is released under

get.summary: Returns information about the financial products offered by a bank
get.description: Returns information about the financial products offered by a bank specified by BANK_ID

/public/banks/{bank_id}/branches.summary: Returns information about branches for a single bank specified by BANK_ID
/public/banks/{bank_id}/branches.description:
Returns information about branches for a single bank specified by BANK_ID including:
* Name
* Address
* Geo Location
* License the data under this endpoint is released under
* Structured opening hours
* Accessible flag
* Branch Type
* More Info
* Pagination:

By default, 50 records are returned.

You can use the url query parameters limit and offset for pagination

You can also use the follow url query parameters:
* city - string, find Branches those in this city, optional
* withinMetersOf - number, find Branches within given meters distance, optional
* nearLatitude - number, a position of latitude value, cooperate with withMetersOf do query filter, optional
* nearLongitude - number, a position of longitude value, cooperate with withMetersOf do query filter, optional

note: withinMetersOf, nearLatitude and nearLongitude either all empty or all have value.

branches.name: Branch by the Lake

license.name: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License

branches.accessibleFeatures: wheelchair, atm usuable by the visually impaired
branches.more_info: short walk to the lake from here

get.summary: Returns information about branches for a single bank specified by BANK_ID
get.description:
Returns information about branches for a single bank specified by BANK_ID:

* Name
* Address
* Geo Location
* License the data under this endpoint is released under
* Structured opening hours
* Accessible flag
* Branch Type
* More Info

Pagination:

By default, 50 records are returned.

You can use the url query parameters limit and offset for pagination
You can also use the follow url query parameters:

* city - string, find Branches those in this city, optional
* withinMetersOf - number, find Branches within given meters distance, optional
* nearLatitude - number, a position of latitude value, cooperate with withMetersOf do query filter, optional
* nearLongitude - number, a position of longitude value, cooperate with withMetersOf do query filter, optional
* note: withinMetersOf, nearLatitude and nearLongitude either all empty or all have value.

/public/banks/{bank_id}/branches/{branch.summary: Returns information about a single Branch specified by BANK_ID and BRANCH_ID
/public/banks/{bank_id}/branches/{branch.description:
Returns information about a single Branch specified by BANK_ID and BRANCH_ID including:
* Name
* Address
* IGeo Location

License the data under this endpoint is released under.

get.description:
Returns information about a single Branch specified by BANK_ID and BRANCH_ID including:

* Name
* Address
* Geo Location
* License the data under this endpoint is released under.
